title: The School of military engineering
brief_description: The instruction and training of engineers in the Australian Military Forces. Shows teaching facilities of the School of Military Engineering. Illustrates the jobs army engineers are required to do: the building of sewages disposal plants; demolition of bridges; the laying of land mines, also the detection and disposal of enemy mines.
